short_summary: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to award a service contract for Preventative Maintenance of the Cryoprobe.
description: The purchase of service will provide regular preventative maintenance service to the CryoPlatform (CP10K Service Including Compressor), system reference AVANCE III HD 600, Serial number 10220195 located at the Charlottetown Research and Development Centre.
full_summary:
====================================

### Preventative Maintenance of the Cryoprobe

### Call for Tenders

#### General Information

* **Call Number:** 01B46-24-006
* **Publication Date:** February 8, 2024
* **Closing Date:** February 23, 2024, at 14:00 (EST)
* **Contract Period:** From March 1, 2024, to February 28, 2025

#### Project Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) intends to award a service contract to a supplier to perform preventative maintenance on the Cryoprobe, a proprietary system installed at the Charlottetown Research and Development Centre. The contract will provide scheduled maintenance services, including:

* Regular planned maintenance visits to ensure optimal system performance
* Exchange of critical components, such as the cold head and compressor
* Online support through secure remote connections
* Software and data system updates and optimization

#### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

Respondents are required to submit a Statement of Capabilities that meets the specified requirements. The selection criteria will focus on the supplier's ability to provide the required services, their level of expertise, and their experience with similar systems.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Carol Rahal, rahal.carol@agr.gc.ca, (514) 231-3209

#### Attachment

The tender documentation, including the full contract details, can be found at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31616/acan.pdf
